headline: Is Home Depot’s Supply Chain Expansion Hiding Value After 8% Slide in 2025?
summary: Ever wondered if Home Depot’s current share price is a bargain or if there is value hidden beneath the surface? Here is what you need to know before making your next move. The stock has experienced some volatility lately. It rose 4.0% in the past week, but slipped by 5.6% over the last 30 days and is down 8.1% year-to-date. Recent news has highlighted investments in Home Depot’s supply chain expansion and continued efforts to boost its professional customer base. This has generated...
